section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on October 13, 2024. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Clean Curbs Pilot Program.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 10 of Fiscal Year 2024 Revised Local Budget Adjustment Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-499, July 8, 2024, 71 DCR 7957).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 6062 of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).
